summary: Allows you to stun people unconscious and loot their bodies.
descriptionHtml:
[b]DESCRIPTION:[/b]
This mod allows you to stun people unconscious and loot their bodies. Any NPC can be stunned while bleeding out. Just activate them ("E" button). Also, after reaching 90 in Sneak skill, player will be able to stun unsuspecting low-level NPCs (level 19 and lower) while in sneak mode. People who don't like these restrictions can try the "unfair" version. You will get an overpowered mace that can stun almost everything.

Default duration of stun effect is 10 minutes.

[u]IMPORTANT:[/u] Game dispels all magic effects (including stun) from NPCs when player leaves location. Currently I can't fix this issue without making mod not safe-to-disable. I don't want NPCs to remain stunned forever if user decides to delete my mod.

[b]FUTURE PLANS:[/b]
- ability to move bodies
- ability to take equipped armor
- find elegant way to retain stun effect on NPCs after leaving location

[b]SION'S CODE:[/b]
All my mods/programs are safe to try and safe to delete at any moment. Vanilla records are changed only if there is no other way. Maximum performance and compatibility.
author: Sion
